short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To add your electronic signature on a photo, you need to select the image, and then drag your signature on top of a picture
short.vi,zh_CN,zh_TW: 要在照片上添加电子签名，您需要选择图像，然后将您的签名拖到图片顶部

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To add your electronic signature on a photo, you need to select the image, and then drag your signature on top of a picture


Key Features:
● Photo Signature Merger: Combines your signature with images.
● Signature Watermark: Adds your signature as a watermark to images.
● Free and No Login: Online tool without registration.
● Signature PNG Maker: Creates PNG signatures for various image formats.

FAQ:
● Adding a Signature to Images: Upload a photo, type your name, and add your signature.
● Creating a Handwritten Signature Image: Sign on paper, scan or take a photo, and save as JPG or PNG.
● Adding a Watermark Signature: Use the drag-and-drop tool to resize and position the watermark.
● Getting a Signature in a Picture: Sign on paper, scan, and open in Word.

Use Case:
● Protect Digital Assets: Safeguard photos and artwork with a watermark to prevent unauthorized use and prove ownership.
long.zh_CN:
要在照片上添加电子签名，您需要选择图像，然后将您的签名拖到图片顶部

主要功能:
● 照片签名合并: 将您的签名与图像结合。
● 签名水印: 将您的签名添加为图像水印。
● 免费且无需登录: 无需注册的在线工具。
● 签名 PNG 制造器: 为各种图像格式创建 PNG 签名。

常见问题:
● 如何将签名添加到图像: 上传照片、输入您的姓名并添加您的签名。
● 如何制作手写签名图像: 在纸上签名，扫描或拍照，并保存为 JPG 或 PNG 格式。
● 如何添加水印签名: 使用拖放工具调整水印大小并定位。
● 如何在图片中获取签名: 在纸上签名，扫描并在 Word 中打开。

用例:
● 保护数字资产: 使用水印保护照片和艺术作品，防止未经授权使用并证明所有权。
